```{r}
poker_vector <- c(140, -50, 20, -120, 240)
roulette_vector <- c(-24, -50, 100, -350, 10)
days_vector <- c("Monday", "Tuesday", "Wednesday", "Thursday", "Friday")
names(poker_vector) <- days_vector
names(roulette_vector) <- days_vector

sum_vector <- sum(poker_vector)
sum_vector 

sum_roulette <- sum(roulette_vector)
sum_roulette

sum_vector > sum_roulette

#elige un vector especifico 

el_dia <- poker_vector[3]
el_dia

#elige ciertos vectores
los_dias <-poker_vector[c(1, 2, 3)]
los_dias

#elige una sucesion de posiciones
todos_los_dias <- poker_vector[1:5]
todos_los_dias 

#elige segun los dias exactos que uo pone
las_dias <- poker_vector[c("Monday","Tuesday")]
las_dias


#COMPARACIONES _________________________
seleccion <- poker_vector >0
seleccion  

los_ganadores <- poker_vector[seleccion]
los_ganadores

```
